      • checkNotFound

        public static void checkNotFound​(boolean found,
                                 java.lang.String message)
        Throws the NotFoundException if a found is false.
        Parameters:
        found - shows availability the entity in the DB.
        message - message for thrown NotFoundException.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - the exception is thrown when entity is not found.
        See Also:
        checkNotFound(Object, String)

      • checkNotFound

        public static <T> T checkNotFound​(T object,
                                  java.lang.String message)
        Returns a checked object, throws the NotFoundException if the checked object is null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the checked object.
        Parameters:
        object - the checked object.
        message - message for thrown NotFoundException.
        Returns:
        the checked object.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the checked object is null.
        See Also:
        checkNotFound(boolean, String)

                                       int id)
        Throws the NotFoundException if a found is false.
        Parameters:
        found - shows availability the entity in the DB.
        id - specific id of the entity.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - the exception is thrown when entity is not found.

      • checkDictionary

        public static void checkDictionary​(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Enum> enumDict,
                                   java.util.List<? extends AbstractDictionary> dict)
        Checks that enum dictionary matches to dictionary in the data base. Number enum constants is equal to number members of the table dictionary. Every enum constant has appropriate member in the table dictionary.
        Parameters:
        enumDict - enum class represents dictionary.
        dict - list of the dictionary members from the data base.

      • getRootCause

        public static java.lang.Throwable getRootCause​(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Returns a root of the specified Throwable object.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the specified Throwable object.
        Returns:
        the root of the specified Throwable object.
